titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the need to reduce the influence of money in politics.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the need to reduce the influence of money in politics.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution and Civil Justice.
